title: temnosvet666
author: temnosvet666
created_time: July 10, 2023, 02:53:55 PMLast edit: July 10, 2023, 03:07:29 PM by temnosvet666
content: Ahoy matey! Join our NFT game, become a treasure hunter and discover the hidden pirate treasure. Unlock clues to riches beyond your wildest dreams! Don't just dream of getting rich, make it a reality. Join our game now and see what fortune awaits!Collect all the information, solve all the puzzles, put everything together and find out where the treasure is hidden! The first person who send the correct location to the sekeersfortreasure@gmail.com will receive the key to the treasure!!!https://drive.google.com/file/d/1t2YFzR6RfYeG_Q306ny3wpqHNaZltrap/view?usp=drive_linkDescription and rules of the gameOur project is an interactive nft-adventure dedicated to finding treasures.The presented NFT collection represents 10,101 inhabitants of a pirate settlement on the island where Captain Russell Gover lived, where his rebellious crew arrived and where the pages of his diary were lost. Many of these inhabitants of the island do not know anything, but some definitely keep these diary sheets, and others have information about the order in which these sheets were placed and can give a tip which of the islanders has a piece of the diary.And so you, an adventurer and treasure hunter, having heard the legend of Captain Gover and learned about his lost treasure, arrive on the island, hoping to try your luck and become a rich man.The goal of each participant is to collect all the information from Captain Gover's diary, decipher it, put it in the right order and finally get the location of the Scratched's treasure. The received place must be sent to sekeersfortreasure@gmail.com. The very first player to do so will receive the final treasure key (assuming the specified location is correct, of course).https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FuaaoOnXgAA-KRD?format=jpg&name=largehttps://pbs.twimg.com/media/FuQhN3aWIAk1jLJ?format=png&name=900x900https://pbs.twimg.com/media/F0lFQPHXgAEzaur?format=png&name=900x900More info:http://treasuregame.quest/https://twitter.com/ExMister_Axehttps://opensea.io/collection/legendary-pirate-treasure
